text: Oulun Kärpät Naiset ("Oulu Women Ermines") is the representative women's ice hockey team of the Finnish sports club Oulun Kärpät 46, based in Oulu. The team plays in the Naisten Liiga, the premier women's hockey league in Finland, where they have competed since the 1994–95 season. Ilves has won the Finnish Championship three times, in 2012, 2017, and 2018. == Team honors == === Finnish Champions === The winner of the Naisten Liiga playoffs earns the Finnish Champion title and receives the Aurora Borealis Cup and Finnish Championship gold medals. Prior to the 2010–11 season, the victorious team was awarded Finnish Championship medals only. * Aurora Borealis Cup (3): 2012, 2017, 2018 * Runners-up (7): 1996, 1998, 2000, 2001, 2003, 2006, 2007 * Third Place (7): 2002, 2004, 2005, 2008, 2011, 2013, 2019 ===IIHF European Women's Champions Cup=== * Bronze (1): 2013 == Players and personnel == === 2020–21 roster === Updated 3 September 2020 === 2020–21 coaching staff === *Head Coach: Janne Salmela *Assistant Coach: Sanna Lankosaari *Goaltending Coach: Tuomas Tarkki *Conditioning Coach: Vesku Vehkaperä *Video Coaches: Hanna-Rikka Karjalainen & Arttu Kuusjärvi *Mental Coach: Marjo Mäyrä *Physical Therapist: Jenny Uusimaa *Team Manager: Ismo Rantasuomela *Equipment Managers: Mika Kaijankoski & Jani Kirstinä === Team captains === *Katja
